name: Bishop Autoturret
name_ja: オートタレット・ビショップ
help: Deploys An Area Of Effect Battle Turret Which Will Deliver Auto-attacks With A Potency Of 60 To All Nearby Enemies. Hypercharge Potency: 120  Hypercharge Effect: Increases Target's Magic Damage Taken By 5%  Duration: 10s Shares A Recast Timer With Rook Autoturret.
json: Deploys an area of effect battle turret which will deliver auto-attacks with a potency of 60 to all nearby enemies.

yes.yes: Hypercharge Potency: 120  Hypercharge Effect: Increases target's magic damage taken by 5%  Duration: 10s

json: Shares a recast timer with Rook Autoturret.
help_html: Deploys An Area Of Effect Battle Turret Which Will Deliver Auto-attacks With A Potency Of 60 To All Nearby Enemies. Hypercharge Potency: 120 Hypercharge Effect: Increases Target's Magic Damage Taken By 5% Duration: 10s Shares A Recast Timer With Rook Autoturret.
